original_text: They want to sit in the best seats in the meeting places. They choose the most important places at special meals.
korean_text: 회당의 높은 자리와 잔치의 윗자리를 원하는 서기관들을 삼가라

sentences.original_text: They want to sit in the best seats
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 최고의 자리에 앉고 싶어 합니다

sentences.original_text: They choose the most important places
